name: Upload Field For Elementor Forms
author: Yehuda Hassine

sections.description:
This plugin will add an upload field to Elementor Pro Forms.
Please notice: because of Elementor Pro API limitations, the file or files will be arrived in a seperate email.

Need a reliable delivery and SMTP solution for your WordPress site?

Check Post SMTP, the best SMTP plugin solution with support for any SMTP service, Email Log, Tools, and built in API support for:
Gmail, SendGrid, Mandrill and Mailgun.
Post SMTP.

Installation

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
